I'm in the midst of doing some housekeeping so these pages are pretty bare - all the information you need for the themes should be available though. :)

Zack 990 v. 1.2 for WordPress

  • License: GPL v3
  • Download: Download from wordpress.org
  • Demo: Demo
  • Fork me on github
  • Support, comments, requests over at GetSatisfaction

Zack 990 is a variation on Ocular Professor commissioned by Joshua Weinberg, who wanted a WordPress theme that really showcased images and video. Inspired by the Boston Globe’s Big Picture, Zack 990 is designed exclusively for photo and video bloggers. This is not a theme for writers, so if your content is more text-based, you might want to check out Oulipo.

As of version 1.1, the footer section of Zack 990 features four columns of widget-ready areas, totally customizable with whichever widgets float your boat. Yup, I just said float your boat.

Change Log

May 16th, 2010

  • Version 1.2 released
  • Fixed caption and alignment issue for vertical images
  • Reworked post-styles to more closely function like The Big Picture
  • Consolidated and re-factored main templates to run off of index.php
  • Added support for paginated posts

March 10th, 2009

  • Version 1.1 released
  • Footer showcases four columns of widget-ready goodness
  • Style updated to further reflect The Big Picture
  • Comments enabled for pages

February 14th, 2009

  • Version 1.0 released

If you use and enjoy Zack 990, please consider donating via PayPal or sending a book from my wish list.

Oulipo v.1.0.9.2 / Last updated October 18th, 2010 / WordPress

Inspired by and named after the group Oulipo, this clean, minimal, grid-based theme was created for authors who want their content to shine. Three-column simplicity with an eye for typography, Oulipo is also available on WordPress.com

Info / Download

Zack 990 v.1.2 / Last updated May 16th, 2010 / WordPress

Based on the Boston Globe's The Big Picture, this theme puts photos and videos up front at 990 pixels wide. Zack 990 is not meant for written content alone, so if your weapon is words then you might want to check out Oulipo.

Info / Download

Got a question? Community feedback, questions, and answers are collected over at Get Satisfaction. If you use and enjoy these themes, consider donating via PayPal or sending a book from my wish list (Kindle editions happily welcome). Ocular Professor and Wakalixes are no longer in active development.
